member.name: T:SimpleMvvmToolkit.UIDispatcher
member.summary: Helper class for dispatching work across threads. WPF apps should call Initialize from the UI thread in App_Start.

member.name: M:SimpleMvvmToolkit.UIDispatcher.CheckAccess
member.summary: Determines whether the calling thread is the thread associated with this Dispatcher.
member.returns: true if the calling thread is the thread associated with this UIDispatcher; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:SimpleMvvmToolkit.UIDispatcher.BeginInvoke(System.Action)
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with the specified array of arguments on the thread the Dispatcher is associated with.
member.param: A delegate to a method that takes multiple arguments, which is pushed onto the Dispatcher event queue.

member.name: M:SimpleMvvmToolkit.UIDispatcher.Initialize
member.summary: Invoke from main UI thread.

member.name: M:SimpleMvvmToolkit.UIDispatcher.Execute(System.Action)
member.summary: Execute an action on the UI thread.

member.name: P:SimpleMvvmToolkit.UIDispatcher.Current
member.summary: Obtain the current dispatcher for cross-thread marshaling
